insert into propertyvalue (property, propertyvalue) values (#{property,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{propertyvalue,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select propertyvalueid, propertyid, propertyvalue from propertyvalue
mapper.update: update propertyvalue set propertyvalue=#{propertyvalue} where propertyid=#{propertyid}
